com.esri.mo2.util
Class BigEndian

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.util.BigEndian
public class BigEndian
extends Object

Handles byte-swapping between binary numbers in different ENDIAN systems. Big endian systems store numbers with the most significant byte first. Little endian systems store numbers with the least significant byte first.
